attributes.action: Stop Pets at Home's Easter Rabbit Offer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pets at Home have just announced that they  will be offering 1 rabbit, a 3ft indoor cage and some accessories for £80 over the Easter period. Let's stop this irresponsible action and save these poor rabbits from the traditional impulse buy at Easter.
Rabbit deserve better and Pets at Home should know better!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
